info.female_impression:
Is there truly anything in this world that poses a challenge for Lycaon?
It seems that no matter what obstacles he encounters, he effortlessly solves them all (as long as you touch his tail)!
info.male_impression:
Belle, did your comment get mixed up with your personal preferences...?
And Fairy suggested touching Lycaon's chin and head, not his tail.
info.outlook_desc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator: Lycaon, with an excellent aptitude for Ether, is authorized to perform basic tasks such as investigating and mining in identified Hollows (including Companion Hollows) within New Eridu.
Note: Lycaon's personal files contain a classified section that requires administrator permissions to access.
It is assumed this section contains information about his past and criminal records.
info.profile_desc:
Lycaon, the substantive leader and representative of Victoria Housekeeping Co., is responsible for managing all members of the company.
Rational and reliable, Lycaon is an elegant gentleman and a versatile attendant who can solve any problem. He is the cornerstone of his team and a reassuring presence.
He has a slight obsession with cleanliness, always tidying up his surroundings and unable to tolerate dirty environments.

Although Lycaon maintains his elegance and composure, his canine instincts occasionally shine through. When he is particularly happy, his tail and ears unconsciously wag. He seems to be aware of this habit and somewhat bothered by it.
Additionally, like most furry Thiren, Lycaon takes great care of his fur.

Suggestion: Since Lycaon is a canine Thiren, stroking his head or chin may enhance the emotional connection between you. (Note: Success is not guaranteed.)
* Risks: Due to his height, you may not be able to do this even if you stand on tiptoes.
unlock_conditions: Complete Agent Story "And the True Heroes Are Always Behind the Scenes"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Full Moon Momentum
mindscape_cinemas.description: When Lycaon's EX Special Attack hits an enemy, the attack's Daze increases by 12%. This effect can trigger once every 8s. When he charges his EX Special Attack to completion, this buff will increase by an additional 10%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Records suggest that werewolves exposed to moonlight become significantly more aggressive.
"Don't stare directly at the moon."

mindscape_cinemas.name: Energy Feedback
mindscape_cinemas.description: When Stunning an enemy or triggering a squad member's Chain Attack, Lycaon gains 5 Energy. Can trigger once every 1s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Canines receive a brief dopamine boost in their brains after completing semi-complex tasks. At that moment, if their owner pets them to show encouragement, they will be extremely happy..."
â€”Excerpt from the "Handbook of Unreliable Canine Research"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Attendant Training
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: His every gesture exudes poise, and his words and actions are as refreshing as a spring breeze. An attendant's training is about maintaining control over everything.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Graceful Demeanor
mindscape_cinemas.description:
If Lycaon is attacked while using a Basic Attack or Special Attack, he will immediately gain a Shield equal to 7.5% of his Max HP, lasting for 15s.
During the Shield's duration, his Anti-Interrupt level is increased. This effect can trigger once every 15s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2: "An outstanding attendant maintains a graceful demeanor at any and all times."

mindscape_cinemas.name: Alpha Nature
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: His glance harbors a primal ferocity, and the echoes of his howls rumble within his throat. Regardless of his current gracefulness, underneath the formal wear, he's still untamed.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Ruthless Hunter
mindscape_cinemas.description: When a charged attack hits an enemy, the target suffers 10% increased DMG from Lycaon, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 12s. Only one stack can be gained per skill use, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Apologies, but given the circumstances, I will not show any mercy."
"After all, if a fair fight is what you are after, a Hollow is not the place to look for it."

descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Moon Hunter
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 strikes in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Hold down  to charge up, increasing the power of the attack and dealing Ice DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge: Suitable Positioning
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Keep it Clean
descriptions.description:
Press  during a dodge to activate:
Slides forward, launching a series of strikes in front, dealing Physical DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Etiquette Manual
descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Special Attack: Time to Hunt
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes a series of strikes in front, dealing Ice DMG.
Hold down  to charge up, increasing its power.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt
descriptions.description:
With enough Energy, press  to activate:
Unleashes a series of powerful strikes in front, dealing massive Ice DMG.
Hold down  to charge up, consuming Energy and enhancing the power of the attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt
Chain Attack: As You Wish
descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a series of powerful strikes at enemies in a small area in front of him, dealing massive Ice DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Ultimate: Mission Complete
descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Unleashes multiple powerful strikes at enemies in a large area, dealing massive Ice DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Wolf Pack
descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Defensive Assist: Disrupted Hunt
descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack
descriptions.description:
Press  after a Defensive Assist to activate:
Creates an icicle in front, which strikes all enemies within range, dealing Ice DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions:
When Lycaon charges his Basic Attack to completion, the attack deals 40% increased Daze.
When EX Special Attack or Assist Follow-Up hits an enemy, the target's Ice DMG RES decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.
